author: "Mattioli, Pietro Andrea, 1500-1577"
title: "De plantis epitome vtilissima, Petri Andreae Matthioli Senensis, ... Nouis plane, et ad viuum expressis iconibus, descriptionibusque longe & pluribus & accuratiorib. nunc primum diligenter aucta, & locupletata, a d. Ioachimo Camerario, ... Accessit, ... l"
